Dialogue.Page: Chert’s Research Notes — property of Chert!
This is the only known Nomai construction on <Color=lightblue>Dark Bramble</Color>. Interestingly, its material places it as one of the newest Nomai structures I've explored.
It looks like construction was never finished. Was it abandoned? Or did something happen to the Nomai here?
The probe down on the observation deck is clearly used for research of some sort. But what were they studying?
There's a device mounted to the probe. I know I've seen devices like it in other Nomai ruins but this one seems to be deactivated.
Oh hey, I just spotted a supernova while taking down camp. Those are normally pretty rare. Neat!
